price: Mana yanje Rurema Allah! Ngira umusenzi atsimbataza isengesho rikwije ibisabwa ku mwanya waryo, Ugire no mu ruvyaro rwanje abasenzi baritsimbataza. Mana yanje Rurema Allah! Ndanagusavye Utwakirire isengesho, Unatwumvire ibisabisho;
arabic: رَبِّ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي مُقِيمَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِيۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلۡ دُعَآءِ

meta.transliteration: rabbi ij'ʿalnī muqīma al-ṣalati wamin dhurriyyatī rabbanā wataqabbal duʿāi
